MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW6 postcode area of Tarporley, affecting properties in Peckforton Hall Lane, Stone House Lane and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  12:13 PM. Our engineers have arrived at the local area  to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2:30 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at  1: 36 PM on 20th November 2020..
